hymn.title: Jesus is tenderly calling thee home

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus is ten -- der -- ly call -- ing thee home— Call -- ing to -- day, call -- ing to -- day! Why from the sun -- shine of love wilt thou roam, Far -- ther and far -- ther a -- way? Call -- ing to -- day! call -- ing to -- day! Je -- sus is call -- ing, is ten -- der -- ly call -- ing to -- day!

lyrics.stanza: Jesus is tenderly calling thee home— Calling today, calling today! Why from the sunshine of love wilt thou roam, Farther and farther away?
Calling today! calling today! Jesus is calling, is tenderly calling today!
Jesus is calling the weary to rest, Calling today! calling today! Bring Him thy burden and thou shalt be blest: He will not turn thee away.
Jesus is waiting, O come to Him now! Waiting today! waiting today! Come with thy sins, at His feet lowly bow; Come, and no longer delay.
Jesus is pleading, O list to His voice! Hear Him today! hear Him today! They who believe on His name shall rejoice: Quickly arise, come away!
